content:
Everyone on LinkedIn: "Screw ChatGPT, I'm switching to Gemini."
Gemini: "Sorry, I'm at full capacity."

 

I guess LinkedIn people migrated all at once ðŸ˜‚

 

This is the first time I've seen such a message. Either on Gemini or ChatGPT.
And Iâ€™m on theÂ paidÂ plan for both.

 

Reality is I cannot choose one tool.
I need to constantly switch to ensure the best outcome for every specific task.

 

Whoever says one is better than the other is lying.

images.alt: Error message stating high traffic and full capacity on Gemini app.

headline: Gemini vs ChatGPT: Why You Can't Pick Just One AI Tool
description: LinkedIn users flock to Gemini but hit capacity. Discover why switching between AI tools like Gemini and ChatGPT is essential for optimal results.
